verses.verse: Then Solomon <S%H8010><s%> began <S%H2490><s%> to build <S%H1129><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> at Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> on Mount <S%H2022><s%> Moriah, <S%H4179><s%> where Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> to David <S%H1732><s%> his father, <S%H1><s%> which he prepared in the place <S%H4725><s%> that David <S%H1732><s%> had appointed, <S%H1637><s%> in the threshing floor of Ornan <S%H771><s%> the Jebusite. <S%H2983><s%>

He began <S%H2490><s%> to build <S%H1129><s%> in the second <S%H8145><s%> day of the second <S%H8145><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> in the fourth <S%H702><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of his reign. <S%H4438><s%>

Now these are the foundations which Solomon <S%H8010><s%> laid <S%H3245><s%> for the building <S%H1129><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%> The length <S%H753><s%> by cubits <S%H520><s%> after the first <S%H7223><s%> measure <S%H4060><s%> was sixty <S%H8346><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits. <S%H520><s%>

The porch <S%H197><s%> that was in front, <S%H6440><s%> its length, <S%H753><s%> according to the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of the house, <S%H1004><s%> was twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> and the height <S%H1363><s%> one hundred <S%H3967><s%> twenty; <S%H6242><s%> and he overlaid <S%H6823><s%> it within <S%H6441><s%> with pure <S%H2889><s%> gold. <S%H2091><s%>

The greater <S%H1419><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> he made a ceiling <S%H2645><s%> with fir <S%H1265><s%> wood, <S%H6086><s%> which he overlaid <S%H2645><s%> with fine <S%H2896><s%> gold, <S%H2091><s%> and ornamented <S%H5927><s%> it with palm trees <S%H8561><s%> and chains. <S%H8333><s%>
He garnished <S%H6823><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> with precious <S%H3368><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> for beauty: <S%H8597><s%> and the gold <S%H2091><s%> was gold <S%H2091><s%> of Parvaim. <S%H6516><s%>

He overlaid <S%H2645><s%> also the house, <S%H1004><s%> the beams, <S%H6982><s%> the thresholds, <S%H5592><s%> and its walls, <S%H7023><s%> and its doors, <S%H1817><s%> with gold; <S%H2091><s%> and engraved <S%H6605><s%> cherubim <S%H3742><s%> on the walls. <S%H7023><s%>

He made <S%H6213><s%> the most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> house: <S%H1004><s%> its length, <S%H753><s%> according to <S%H6440><s%> the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of the house, <S%H1004><s%> was twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> and its breadth <S%H7341><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits; <S%H520><s%> and he overlaid <S%H2645><s%> it with fine <S%H2896><s%> gold, <S%H2091><s%> amounting to six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> talents. <S%H3603><s%>

The weight <S%H4948><s%> of the nails <S%H4548><s%> was fifty <S%H2572><s%> shekels <S%H8255><s%> of gold. <S%H2091><s%> He overlaid <S%H2645><s%> the upper rooms <S%H5944><s%> with gold. <S%H2091><s%>

In the most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> he made <S%H6213><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> cherubim <S%H3742><s%> of image <S%H6816><s%> work; <S%H4639><s%> and they overlaid <S%H6823><s%> them with gold. <S%H2091><s%>

The wings <S%H3671><s%> of the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> were twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> long: <S%H753><s%> the wing <S%H3671><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> was five <S%H2568><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> reaching <S%H5060><s%> to the wall <S%H7023><s%> of the house; <S%H1004><s%> and the other <S%H312><s%> wing <S%H3671><s%> was five <S%H2568><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> reaching <S%H5060><s%> to the wing <S%H3671><s%> of the other <S%H312><s%> cherub. <S%H3742><s%>

The wing <S%H3671><s%> of the other <S%H259><s%> cherub <S%H3742><s%> was five <S%H2568><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> reaching <S%H5060><s%> to the wall <S%H7023><s%> of the house; <S%H1004><s%> and the other <S%H312><s%> wing <S%H3671><s%> was five <S%H2568><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> joining <S%H1695><s%> to the wing <S%H3671><s%> of the other <S%H312><s%> cherub. <S%H3742><s%>

The wings <S%H3671><s%> of these cherubim <S%H3742><s%> spread themselves forth <S%H6566><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits: <S%H520><s%> and they stood <S%H5975><s%> on their feet, <S%H7272><s%> and their faces <S%H6440><s%> were toward the house. <S%H1004><s%>

He made <S%H6213><s%> the veil <S%H6532><s%> of blue, <S%H8504><s%> and purple, <S%H713><s%> and crimson, <S%H3758><s%> and fine linen, <S%H948><s%> and ornamented <S%H5927><s%> it with cherubim. <S%H3742><s%>

Also he made <S%H6213><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> pillars <S%H5982><s%> of thirty <S%H7970><s%> - five <S%H2568><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> high, <S%H753><s%> and the capital <S%H6858><s%> that was on the top <S%H7218><s%> of each of them was five <S%H2568><s%> cubits. <S%H520><s%>

He made <S%H6213><s%> chains <S%H8333><s%> in the oracle, <S%H1687><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> them on the tops <S%H7218><s%> of the pillars; <S%H5982><s%> and he made <S%H6213><s%> one hundred <S%H3967><s%> pomegranates, <S%H7416><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> them on the chains. <S%H8333><s%>

He set up <S%H6965><s%> the pillars <S%H5982><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the temple, <S%H1964><s%> one <S%H259><s%> on the right hand, <S%H3225><s%> and the other <S%H259><s%> on the left; <S%H8040><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of that on the right hand <S%H3233><s%> Jachin, <S%H3199><s%> and the name <S%H8034><s%> of that on the left <S%H8042><s%> Boaz. <S%H1162><s%>
